bibl.title: P. Kellis I 67 Revisited.
bibl.note: Presents solutions to three major issues: The reading of the Syriac on the address, the reading and meaning of the postscript (especially ll. 20-21); the religio-cultural context, including date [third quarter of the fourth century] and provenance; the relationship of this piece to other textual material recovered from House Three at Ismant el-Kharab.
GARDNER Iain, P. Kellis I 67 Revisited.
